metadata.name: Cracks in Reality
metadata.description:
My art is collected by the undisputed icons of this digital art era. From  
the likes of collectors like Metakovan and Cozomo de' Medici to creatives  
like Pranksy.  
I try to capture the essence of life with a near-  
obsessive attention for detail and blending. Every piece of art is the  
culmination of single, individually drawn, wavy lines in a deliberate  
attempt to instill a feeling of uncertainty while giving each piece a  
dubious figure with a questionable existence.  
To me, the art must resonate with the experience, and the  
experience with the art. Each piece is delicately and  
preemptively hand-drawn in the form of the experiences, whether  
they are conscious or subconscious, that they may endure.

The absoluteness of any piece is elusive.  
Join my multiverse by collecting this first piece, and embark on a journey of communal value-building.

Roadmap:  
1) The OE Mint - Acquire a piece that epitomizes my perspective  
2) The Burn - During this step, depending on how many you mint, you will be able to burn either once or many times  
3) The Transformation - The piece will transform, again depending on how many burned  
4) Ephemeral Transcendence - This final step will reveal the behind-the-scenes. The funding powerhouse, and the project team. The pieces will be assigned values from 1-5, the higher being more rare and generate more value.
